publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2620 Tricia Marwick: Miners' Pension Scheme—That the Parliament welcomes the £8 million released from Her Majesty’s Treasury to miners' pension schemes; notes that many ex-miners or widows of ex-miners are living in poverty while HM Treasury receives £250 million per year from the profits of the schemes; further notes that Her Majesty's Government will take over £4 billion from the schemes, and demands that Her Majesty's Government return all of the profits to the pension schemes to allow the ex-miners and their families to receive the benefits of the scheme to which they contributed. Supported by: Robin Harper*

S1M-2620 Tricia Marwick: Miners' Pension Scheme-That the Parliament welcomes the £8 million released from Her Majesty's Treasury to miners' pension schemes; notes that many ex-miners or widows of ex-miners are living in poverty while HM Treasury receives £250 million per year from the profits of the schemes; further notes that Her Majesty's Government will take over £4 billion from the schemes, and demands that Her Majesty's Government return all of the profits to the pension schemes to allow the ex-miners and their families to receive the benefits of the scheme to which they contributed to. Supported by: Robin Harper, Stewart Stevenson*
